channel.title: Server Downloads is a movie
channel.description:
Anybody else ever realize how a lot of topics in server downloads board becomes like a movie? You got the topic creator/leecher on one side, and the actual coders on the other. We try to give feedback by saying it's horrible and they rage at us.
I just read one topic and wanted to get some popcorn for it while reading the topic comments lol...

item.title: Server Downloads is a movie
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

best comedy ive ever seen tbh

Read full topic

item.title: Server Downloads is a movie
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:4, topic:390679”]OF: Don’t think this thread will last, not much discussion.

OT: Suppose I can agree, I either look at the thread and server and comment on it, or look at the first picture and decide whether it’s bad or not, which a lot of them are. I’ve never kind of paid attention to these kinds of things. Just report the flamers to the Moderators, and leave it at that. I’m tired of seeing all these DSPK’s, as well as the 508 based crap (317 servers having 508 stuff).[/quote]

To be honest the 508 maps are crap in the 317’s most items are messed up, if you are determined to use higher maps in 317 use 474 maps.

OF: i am aware topic won’t last just something random I thought about.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Downloads is a movie
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

OF: Don’t think this thread will last, not much discussion.

OT: Suppose I can agree, I either look at the thread and server and comment on it, or look at the first picture and decide whether it’s bad or not, which a lot of them are. I’ve never kind of paid attention to these kinds of things. Just report the flamers to the Moderators, and leave it at that. I’m tired of seeing all these DSPK’s, as well as the 508 based crap (317 servers having 508 stuff).

Read full topic

item.title: Server Downloads is a movie
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

marcbob:

If you don’t mind me asking, what have you contributed? But I do agree most releases these days are DSPK rip offs.

I mostly try to help in Server Help when I can, I have no server to release because my server is still being used.

Read full topic
